## GetDataSourceListFilters interface


<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface GetDataSourceListFilters 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { GetDataSourceListFilters } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alerting](#alerting-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Only filter data sources that support alerting |
|  [all](#all-property) | <code>boolean</code> | By default only data sources that can be queried will be returned. Meaning they have tracing, metrics, logs or annotations flag set in plugin.json file |
|  [annotations](#annotations-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Only return data sources that support annotations |
|  [dashboard](#dashboard-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Set to true to return dashboard data source |
|  [filter](#filter-property) | <code>(dataSource: DataSourceInstanceSettings) =&gt; boolean</code> | apply a function to filter |
|  [logs](#logs-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Only return data sources that support logging response |
|  [metrics](#metrics-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Only return data sources that support metrics response |
|  [mixed](#mixed-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Include mixed data source by setting this to true |
|  [pluginId](#pluginid-property) | <code>string</code> | filter list by plugin |
|  [tracing](#tracing-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Only return data sources that support tracing response |
|  [type](#type-property) | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | Only returns datasources matching the specified types (ie. Loki, Prometheus) |
|  [variables](#variables-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Set to true to return data source variables |

### alerting property

Only filter data sources that support alerting

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
alerting?: boolean;
```

### all property

By default only data sources that can be queried will be returned. Meaning they have tracing, metrics, logs or annotations flag set in plugin.json file

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
all?: boolean;
```

### annotations property

Only return data sources that support annotations

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
annotations?: boolean;
```

### dashboard property

Set to true to return dashboard data source

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
dashboard?: boolean;
```

### filter property

apply a function to filter

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
filter?: (dataSource: DataSourceInstanceSettings) => boolean;
```

### logs property

Only return data sources that support logging response

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
logs?: boolean;
```

### metrics property

Only return data sources that support metrics response

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
metrics?: boolean;
```

### mixed property

Include mixed data source by setting this to true

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
mixed?: boolean;
```

### pluginId property

filter list by plugin

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
pluginId?: string;
```

### tracing property

Only return data sources that support tracing response

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
tracing?: boolean;
```

### type property

Only returns datasources matching the specified types (ie. Loki, Prometheus)

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
type?: string | string[];
```

### variables property

Set to true to return data source variables

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
variables?: boolean;
```
